headlines.description: Chelsea defeated Crystal Palace 2-0 at Stamford Bridge on Saturday to move up to second in the Premier League table.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pulisic, Abraham score as Chelsea go second

headlines.description: West Ham United's winless streak extended to six games as they suffered a 3-0 defeat to a Burnley side inspired by Dwight McNeil.
headlines.shortLinkText: West Ham's winless run continues at Burnley

headlines.description: Goals from DeAndre Yedlin and Ciaran Clarke helped Newcastle United recover from a goal down to beat Bournemouth 2-1 at St James's Park on Saturday
headlines.shortLinkText: Yedlin strikes as Newcastle beat Bournemouth

headlines.description: Goals from Tom Davies and Richarlison gave Everton their first away win of the season and eased the pressure on under-fire manager Marco Silva.
headlines.shortLinkText: Everton claim first away win of season

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur's 1-1 Premier League draw with Sheffield United on Saturday was dominated by VAR involvement.
headlines.shortLinkText: VAR dominates Spurs' draw with Sheffield

headlines.description: Leicester City made a huge statement of intent with a convincing 2-0 victory against Arsenal in the rain.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vardy and Maddison goals sink sorry Arsenal
